questions.question: He ……………….. the pictures on the wall.
questions.description: Hung is the past tense of hang when it means be suspended from above.

questions.question: The man was ………………….. for murder.
questions.description: When hang means to kill someone by hanging, its past tense is hanged.

questions.question: I ……………………. him a moment ago.
questions.description: The present perfect is not used with the time expression ago.

questions.question: He ………………….. in
questions.description: The present perfect is not used with past time expressions.

questions.question: He ………………….. ill for about a month.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about an action or situation that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: He lost his phone shortly after he ………………………… it.
questions.description: The simple or the past perfect is possible here.

questions.question: I …………………….. you for a long time.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about an action or situation that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: I ……………………… him to go.
questions.description: Before a personal object, use tell.

questions.question: Neither of the messengers ……………………….. returned.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after either and neither.

questions.question: The quality of the apples ………………………… not good.
questions.description: Here the subject is the singular noun quality.

questions.question: One of my sisters ………………………. abroad.
questions.description: Here the subject is the singular noun one.

questions.question: The mother cat with her kittens …………………………. hiding under the bed.
questions.description: When we connect two subjects with 'with', the verb agrees with the first subject in number.
